r.t: Start of Block: Default Question Block (70 Questions)
If jobcat2 = 12 or jobcat3 = 9 or jobcat4 = 6 or jobcat5 = 9 or jobcat11 = 3
1 MFAC_RADIO_1 - In the last working week, did you work in metal plating?
1A1 MFAC_CHECK_1A1 - What metals did you use for plating? [INTERVIEWER: Please ask as an open ended question and code responses into categories below.]
1A1B1 MFAC_RADIO_1A1B1 - In the last working week, did you do hard chromium plating?
1A1D1 MFAC_RADIO_1A1D1 - In the last working week, did you do electroless plating with copper?
1A1D1A1 MFAC_RADIO_1A1D1A1 - In the last working week, did you use formaldehyde solution?

1A2 MFAC_RADIO_1A2 - In the last working week, did you work in anodising? [INTERVIEWER READ OUT IF NECESSARY: Anodising is an electrochemical process that converts the metal surface into a decorative, durable, corrosion-resistant, anodic oxide finish]
1A2A1 MFAC_RADIO_1A2A1 - In the last working week, did you use a lead cathode for anodising?
1A3 MFAC_RADIO_1A3 - Were the plating/polishing tanks exhausted to remove the fumes from the room?
1A4 MFAC_RADIO_1A4 - Were any other methods of fume control used? E.g., Croffles to cover the surface of the plating/polishing tank or a lid on the container
If jobcat2 = 12 or jobcat3 = 9 or jobcat4 = 6 or jobcat5 = 9 or jobcat11 = 3
2 MFAC_RADIO_2 - In the last working week, did you apply any types of metal coating?
2A1 MFAC_CHECK_2A1 - in the last working week, what types of coatings did you apply to the metal products?
2A1A1 MFAC_CHECK_2A1A1 - What types of organic coatings did you apply?
2A1A2 MFAC_CHECK_2A1A2 - How did you apply the organic coating?
2A1B1 MFAC_CHECK_2A1B1 - In the last working week, what types of metal thermal spray coatings did you apply?
MFAC_2A1B1B Metals, alloys and their related compounds (2)
If 2A1B1 = MFAC_2A1B1B Metals, alloys and their related compounds
2A1B1B1 MFAC_CHECK_2A1B1B1 - Which of the following metals, alloys or their related compounds did you use for thermal spray coating?
2A1B2 MFAC_RADIO_2A1B2 - In the last working week, did you use a fully automated system in an enclosed booth or a semi-automated/hand-held system to apply the thermal spray coating?
MFAC_2A1B2A A fully automated system in an enclosed booth (1)
MFAC_2A1B2B A semi-automated or hand-held system (2)
If 2A1B2 = MFAC_2A1B2B A semi-automated or hand-held system
2A1B2B1 MFAC_RADIO_2A1B2B1 - In the last working week, did you use an exhaust hood or local exhaust ventilation when applying the metal thermal spray coatings?
If 2A1B2 = MFAC_2A1B2B A semi-automated or hand-held system
2A1B2B2 MFAC_RADIO_2A1B2B2 - In the last working week, did you use respiratory protective equipment when applying the metal thermal spray coatings?
2A1C1 MFAC_RADIO_2A1C1 - Which of the following systems did you use to apply the fired enamel in the last working week?
MFAC_2A1C1A A fully automated system in an enclosed booth (1)
MFAC_2A1C1B A semi-automated or hand-held system (2)
If 2A1C1 = MFAC_2A1C1B A semi-automated or hand-held system
2A1C1B1 MFAC_RADIO_2A1C1B1 - In the last working week, did you use an exhaust hood or local exhaust ventilation when applying the fired enamel?
If 2A1C1 = MFAC_2A1C1B A semi-automated or hand-held system
2A1C1B2 MFAC_RADIO_2A1C1B2 - In the last working week, did you use respiratory protective equipment when applying fired enamel?
2A1C2 MFAC_RADIO_2A1C2 - Which of the following methods did you use to clean the working area in the last working week?
If jobcat2 = 12 or jobcat3 = 9 or jobcat4 = 6 or jobcat5 = 9 or jobcat11 = 3
4 MFAC_RADIO_4 - In the last working week, did you grind or polish the metal before plating or coating it?
4A1 MFAC_CHECK_4A1 - Which of the following metals did you grind or polish before plating or coating?
MFAC_4A1E Hard metal alloys (e.g., Tungsten carbide or Stellite) (5)
4A1F1 MFAC_CHECK_4A1F1 - Which of the following iron or steel did you grind or polish before plating or coating?
MFAC_4A1F1F Steel or iron but not sure what type (6)
If jobcat2 = 12 or jobcat3 = 9 or jobcat4 = 6 or jobcat5 = 9 or jobcat11 = 3
5 MFAC_RADIO_5 - In the last working week, did you clean the metal before plating or coating it?
1 MFAC_aDEG_RADIO_5A1_1 - In the last working week, did you degrease items?
1A1 MFAC_aDEG_RADIO_5A1_1A1 - In the last working week, did you degrease using chemicals other than detergents?
1A1A1 MFAC_aDEG_CHECK_5A1_1A1A1 - In the last working week, did you use any of the following methods to degrease?
aDEG_1A1A1A By hand e.g., with rag, cloth or brush (1)
If 1A1A1 = MFAC_aDEG_1A1A1A By hand e.g., with rag, cloth or brush
1A1A1A1 MFAC_aDEG_CHECK_5A1_1A1A1A1 - What chemicals did you use to clean by hand?
1A1A1B1 MFAC_aDEG_CHECK_5A1_1A1A1B1 - What chemicals did you use to spray parts?
If 1A1A1 = MFAC_aDEG_1A1A1C Conveyorised degreaser (automatic closed machine)
1A1A1C1 MFAC_aDEG_CHECK_5A1_1A1A1C1 - What chemicals did you use in the conveyorised degreaser?
1A1A1D1 MFAC_aDEG_CHECK_5A1_1A1A1D1 - What chemicals did you use in the dip tank?
1A1A1D2 MFAC_aDEG_RADIO_5A1_1A1A1D2 - Was the dip tank kept covered when not in use?
1A1A1D3 MFAC_aDEG_RADIO_5A1_1A1A1D3 - Was there a ventilation system on the dip tank?
1A1A1E1 MFAC_aDEG_CHECK_5A1_1A1A1E1 - What chemicals did you use in the vapour degreaser?
1A1A1E2 MFAC_aDEG_RADIO_5A1_1A1A1E2 - Was the vapour degreaser covered when not in use?
1A1A1E3 MFAC_aDEG_RADIO_5A1_1A1A1E3 - Was there a ventilation system on the vapour degreaser?
1A1A1E4 MFAC_aDEG_RADIO_5A1_1A1A1E4 - Were there cooling coils around the vapour degreaser?
1A1A1F1 MFAC_aDEG_CHECK_5A1_1A1A1F1 - What chemicals did you use in the ultrasonic cleaner?
1A2 MFAC_aDEG_RADIO_5A1_1A2 - In the last working week, did you use respiratory protection?
1A2A1 MFAC_aDEG_CHECK_5A1_1A2A1 - What types of respiratory protective equipment (RPE) did you use?
aDEG_1A2A1A Rubber face mask fitted with a particle/vapour filter or a cartridge (1)
aDEG_1A2A1C Air-supplied respirator or SCBA (self-contained breathing apparatus) (3)
If jobcat2 = 12 or jobcat3 = 9 or jobcat4 = 6 or jobcat5 = 9 or jobcat11 = 3
6 MFAC_CHECK_6 - What types of personal protective equipment or clothing did you wear while working in metal finishing?
MFAC_6A Long sleeved shirt or T-shirt (1)
If jobcat2 = 12 or jobcat3 = 9 or jobcat4 = 6 or jobcat5 = 9 or jobcat11 = 3
7 MFAC_RADIO_7 - In the last working week, did you use respiratory protection?
7A1 MFAC_CHECK_7A1 - What types of respiratory protective equipment (RPE) did you use?
MFAC_7A1A Rubber face mask fitted with a particle/vapour filter or a cartridge (1)
MFAC_7A1C Air-supplied respirator or SCBA (self-contained breathing apparatus) (3)
MFAC_7A1D A filtering face piece mask or dust mask (called an FFP) (4)
If jobcat2 = 12 or jobcat3 = 9 or jobcat4 = 6 or jobcat5 = 9 or jobcat11 = 3
1 MFAC_aXRY_RADIO_8_1 - In the last working week, did you use x-rays, radar, or other radiation sources for quality assurance?
1A1 MFAC_aXRY_CHECK_8_1A1 - What types of radiation sources did you use?
aXRY_1A1B X-ray equipment or linear accelerators (2)
If 1A1 = MFAC_aXRY_1A1B X-ray equipment or linear accelerators
1A1B1 MFAC_aXRY_RADIO_8_1A1B1 - Were you protected by a lead partition/wall when using X-ray equipment?
If 1A1 = MFAC_aXRY_1A1B X-ray equipment or linear accelerators
1A1B2 MFAC_aXRY_RADIO_8_1A1B2 - In the last working week, did you use radio-protective garments (such as lead aprons, gloves, thyroid guards) when using x-ray equipment?
If 1A1 = MFAC_aXRY_1A1B X-ray equipment or linear accelerators
1A1B3 MFAC_aXRY_RADIO_8_1A1B3 - In the last working week, did you wear an individual dosimetry badge when using X-ray equipment?
1A1C1 MFAC_aXRY_RADIO_8_1A1C1 - Were you protected by a lead, concrete or steel shielding or wall when using gammagraphy equipment?
1A1C2 MFAC_aXRY_RADIO_8_1A1C2 - In the last working week, did you use radio-protective garments (such as lead aprons, gloves, thyroid guards) when using gammagraphy equipment?
1A1C3 MFAC_aXRY_RADIO_8_1A1C3 - In the last working week, did you wear an individual dosimetry badge when using gammagraphy equipment?
1A2 MFAC_aXRY_RADIO_8_1A2 - In the last working week, did you work with mobile X-ray or gammagraphy equipment?
1A2A1 MFAC_aXRY_RADIO_8_1A2A1 - Did you wear a real-time electronic dosimeter?
If jobcat2 = 12 or jobcat3 = 9 or jobcat4 = 6 or jobcat5 = 9 or jobcat11 = 3
1 MFAC_aGEX_RADIO_9_1 - In the last working week, were there generators running in the area(s) where you worked?
1A1 MFAC_aGEX_CHECK_9_1A1 - Where were these generators located?
1A1A1 MFAC_aGEX_CHECK_9_1A1A1 - How was the area ventilated?
aGEX_1A1A1A By local exhaust ventilation which captured the vapour, dust, fume at the emission point (1)
aGEX_1A1A1B By on-tool extraction to remove dust and fumes away from your face (2)
aGEX_1A1A1C By a general ventilation system (3)
aGEX_1A1A1D By fans in the window or doorway (4)
aGEX_1A1A1E By open doors or windows (5)
aGEX_1A1A1F No ventilation was applied to the area (6)
1A2 MFAC_aGEX_CHECK_9_1A2 - What were these generators powered by?
1A3 MFAC_aGEX_RADIO_9_1A3 - In the last working week, did you refuel the generator yourself?
1A4 MFAC_aGEX_RADIO_9_1A4 - How far away were you working from these generators?
1A5 MFAC_aGEX_RADIO_9_1A5 - In the last working week, did you smell exhaust from the generators?
If jobcat2 = 12 or jobcat3 = 9 or jobcat4 = 6 or jobcat5 = 9 or jobcat11 = 3
1 MFAC_aCTO_RADIO_10_1 - In the last working week, did you use cutting or cooling oils?
1A1 MFAC_aCTO_CHECK_10_1A1 - What types of cutting or cooling oils did you use? (May also be referred to as lubricating or machine oils or fluids.)
aCTO_1A1A Straight cutting oils (clear and feels oily) (1)
aCTO_1A1B Soluble cutting oils (milky white and feels watery) (2)
aCTO_1A1C Semi-synthetic cutting oils (forms a semi-transparent fluid when mixed with water) (3)
aCTO_1A1D Synthetic oils which are water soluble (forms a clear fluid when mixed with water) (4)
1A2 MFAC_aCTO_CHECK_10_1A2 - In the last working week, did you use cutting or cooling oils with hand tools or with a fixed machine?
1A2B1 MFAC_aCTO_RADIO_10_1A2B1 - In the last working week, did you use an enclosed machine (you had to open a door on the machine to see the machining fluid)?
1A2B1B1 MFAC_aCTO_RADIO_10_1A2B1B1 - Did you allow time for the mist or droplets to settle before opening the machine?
If jobcat2 = 12 or jobcat3 = 9 or jobcat4 = 6 or jobcat5 = 9 or jobcat11 = 3
1 MFAC_aCLH_RADIO_11_1 - In the last working week, did you clean your hands with anything other than water, soap, detergent, or antibacterial gel/spray at work?
1A1 MFAC_aCLH_CHECK_11_1A1 - In the last working week, did you use any of the following to clean your hands at work?
aCLH_1A1B Mineral turpentine, mineral spirits or white spirit or paint thinner (2)
